metadata.title: CVE-2018-16384 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A SQL injection bypass (aka PL1 bypass) exists in OWASP ModSecurity CoreRule Set (owasp-modsecurity-crs) through v3.1.0-rc3 via {`a`b} where a is aspecial function name (such as "if") and b is the SQL statement to beexecuted.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
